text: If you want to see a rainbow you have to learn to see the rain.
author: 5f5a84f184c7a20869217abe

text: Anger is the ultimate destroyer of your own peace of mind.
author: 5f5a87c8c5276b090581d1c6

text: Imagine all of us living in peace, it's too beautiful to just be a dream.
author: 5f5a84f184c7a20869217ac0

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: 5f5a84f184c7a20869217ac1
